sellerCard.oneLiner: Mobile App Development, iOS, Android, Web Apps Development Expert
sellerCard.description:
Hi, I'm Vivek Dharmani, a software developer and consultant with a proven 12+ year track record of creating dynamic mobile apps. I specialize in taking your vision and building the app that will spread like wildfire across the digital landscape.
Born in India and globally experienced (USA, UK, Europe, Australia), I hold an honors degree in Software Engineering. Now, as founder of my own IT company, I'm eager to leverage my skills for your project's success.

Providing expert support for all your web and mobile app needs.

Ready to launch your next app sensation? Contact me today!

description.content:
I'm a skilled web app developer with expertise in industry-standard technologies to bring your vision to life. Whether you need a simple website or a complex e-commerce platform, I can build a custom website as per your needs.



My web app development expertise covers a wide range:


  • Fast & Efficient: Leveraging technologies like PHP4/5, Node.JS, Python, Laravel, MySQL, and code optimization, your web app will run smoothly and load quickly.
  • Beautiful & User-Friendly: HTML5/CSS3 and modern design principles ensure your app is visually stunning and easy to navigate.
  • CMS (Content Management System) Expertise: I can build robust websites using popular platforms like WordPress, Magento, or Shopify.
  • Framework Mastery: MVC frameworks like CodeIgniter are my specialty, ensuring a clean and scalable codebase.


Let's discuss your project today! I offer a free consultation to assess your needs and recommend the best approach for your web app development.

reviews.comment: They took the time to understand my vision and offered valuable insights that greatly enhanced the overall design and functionality of the site. The attention to detail was impressive, and the project was completed ahead of schedule without compromising quality. I particularly appreciated their responsive communication throughout the process, making collaboration smooth and efficient.
Amazing and great to work with
Very great work and attention to detail. All my concerns were addressed, I look forward to doing more projects with him and his team!
